suggestions.title: Total Sales by Product Category
suggestions.insight: Electronics leads the market with 45% of total sales, followed by Home & Garden at 28%. This indicates strong consumer demand for tech products.

suggestions.title: Revenue Trend Over Time
suggestions.insight: Revenue shows a consistent upward trend from January to December, with a notable spike in Q4. This suggests seasonal buying patterns in the last quarter.

suggestions.title: Market Share Distribution
suggestions.insight: Your company holds 32% of the market, competing closely with three other major players. There's opportunity to increase market share by 5-10% through targeted campaigns.

suggestions.title: Customer Spending vs Age Group
suggestions.insight: There's a positive correlation between customer age and spending patterns, with customers aged 35-55 showing the highest average purchase values.

notes.response_format: JSON array of objects where keys match x_axis and y_axis parameter names
notes.important: Chart type names must be lowercase and match the supported types above
